ygData.subject: What a night!
ygData.msgSnippet: My first planes trip since August? 1999!!!!! As many on our list know I had a high level Bard on Test and had been on a few planes runs there.  Well, last
ygData.messageBody:
My first planes trip since August? 1999!!!!!

As many on our list know I had a high level Bard on Test and had been on a few planes runs there. Well, last night hallmarked my first planes run _ever_ on a live server! Hehe no big deal but it was to me. I haven't done a planes run in months and it was really nice to do one again. Especially since I deleted my bard on Test during the incredible Pwipe fiasco.

I went to Hate with my guild last night (Isengard on Saryrn server) and within 1 hour I scored both the 6 note blade and Evensong off the Maestro of Rancor. I had to log out shortly thereafter without seeing a single piece of Imbrued drop but hey, I was happy nonetheless.

Ciao!

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath
(who is VERY happy to be planes ready once again)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
